TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CodeDomSerializer extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CodeDomSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: 将对象图序列化为一系列 CodeDOM 语句。

span.span: Serializes an object graph to a series of CodeDOM statements.

summary.span: 此类提供序列化程序的抽象基类。

span.span: This class provides an abstract base class for a serializer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以实现自定义 ，以便在设计时控制某个类型组件的组件初始化代码的生成。You can implement a custom to control the generation of component initialization code for a type of component at design time. 若要实现某个类型的自定义 ，必须执行以下操作：To implement a custom for a type, you must: 1. 定义一个从 派生的类。Define a class that derives from . 2. 实现序列化或反序列化方法的方法重写。Implement method overrides for serialization or deserialization methods. （有关详细信息，请参阅下面的信息。）(See the information below for details.) 3. 使用 将自定义 实现与某种类型的组件相关联。Associate your custom implementation with a type of component using a . 实现用于为组件生成配置代码的序列化方法：To implement a serialization method for generating configuration code for a component: 1. 在从 派生的类中，重写基类的适当序列化或反序列化方法。Within a class that derives from , override an appropriate serialization or deserialization method of the base class. 2. 如果希望默认序列化程序生成执行默认组件配置的代码语句，则必须获取并调用组件的基序列化程序。If you want the default serializer to generate code statements that perform the default component configuration, you must obtain and call the base serializer for the component. 若要获取组件的基本序列化程序，请调用传递给方法重写的 的 方法。To obtain the base serializer for the component, call the method of the passed to your method override. 向 方法传递组件的类型，以序列化的配置，以及您请求的序列化程序的基类型，该类型是 的。Pass the method the type of the component to serialize the configuration of, along with the base type of serializer you are requesting, which is . 使用传递给方法重写的 和对象调用正在基本序列化程序重写的同名方法。Call the method of the same name you are overriding on the base serializer, using the and object passed to your method override. 如果要实现 方法，则基序列化程序的 方法将返回一个对象。If you are implementing the method, the method of the base serializer will return an object. 此对象的类型取决于基序列化程序的类型，它取决于要序列化其值的组件的类型。The type of this object depends on the type of base serializer which depends on the type of component you are serializing the values of. 如果要实现 、或 方法，必须创建新的 以包含生成的代码语句，并将其传递给方法。If you are implementing the , , or method, you must create a new to contain the generated code statements, and pass it to the method. 3. 如果已调用基序列化程序方法，则会有一个 ，其中包含要生成的用于初始化组件的语句。If you have called a base serializer method, you will have a that contains the statements to generate to initialize the component. 否则，应创建 。Otherwise you should create a . 你可以将表示要在组件配置代码中生成的语句的 对象添加到此集合。You can add objects representing statements to generate in the component configuration code to this collection. 4. 返回表示要生成的源代码以配置组件的 。Return the that represents the source code to generate to configure the component. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建派生自 的自定义 CodeDOM 序列化程序。The following code example illustrates how to create a custom CodeDOM serializer that derives from . [!code-cpp[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/CPP/idesignerserializationmanagersample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/CS/idesignerserializationmanagersample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/VB/idesignerserializationmanagersample.vb#1)]

para.span: 当从 继承时，必须重写下面的成员： 和 。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the following members: and .

related.span: 动态源代码生成和编译

span.span: Dynamic Source Code Generation and Compilation

remarks.format: ## Remarks 等效于调用 ，不同的是，如果生成的语句是变量赋值语句、带有 init 表达式的变量声明或字段赋值语句，则它将返回对象实例。The is equivalent of calling , except that it returns an object instance if the resulting statement was a variable assign statement, a variable declaration with an init expression, or a field assignment statement.

The serialized value.

returns.span: 如果无法获得指定值的引用表达式，或者无法序列化该值，则该方法返回 。

span.span: This returns if no reference expression can be obtained for the specified value, or the value cannot be serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法与 类似，不同之处在于，它在无法获取值的简单引用表达式时停止。This method is similar to , except that it stops if it cannot obtain a simple reference expression for the value. 如果希望将生成的表达式用作语句的参数或目标，请调用此方法。Call this method when you expect the resulting expression to be used as a parameter or target of a statement.
